subject: Re: [Action Needed] WriteWise: Google for Startups Cloud Program Update
content:
WriteWise is an AI-powered email assistant that learns how you write by analysing your past messages and then helps you polish new drafts so they still feel like “you.” It builds a personal writing profile—capturing your formality, politeness, certainty and even emotional tone—by extracting linguistic features and grouping them into style clusters. Once it knows your voice, it uses the OpenAI GPT-4 API to suggest stronger subject lines, clearer structure and more precise wording, all while keeping your authentic phrasing intact.

Under the hood, a Python/Flask backend handles feature extraction, PCA-based clustering and ML-driven profile generation, then serves a lightweight Chrome extension that plugs right into Gmail. When you start typing, your draft is sent to the server, matched to the cluster that best fits the context (formal, casual or professional), and rewritten on the fly. The whole pipeline runs in the cloud—scalable compute for style analysis, secure storage for your profile and metadata, and fast OpenAI calls for instant feedback.

The result is a smarter email workflow that saves you time and keeps your genuine voice front and centre. Whether you’re firing off a quick catch-up to a friend or drafting a proposal for a client, WriteWise adapts its suggestions to the situation. As you use it more, it refines its understanding of your style, so every message you send could be a little crisper—and still unmistakably you.
email_chain:
Google for Startups Cloud Program Team <cloudstartupsupport-noreply@google.com>
Mar 5, 2025, 2:45 PM
to me

 

 


Thank you for applying to the Google for Startups Cloud Program. Please take the action below, so we can finish processing your application.

‌


We were not able to verify the company website you provided on your application - this means the link either did not load, led to a different page that did not match your company domain, or did not contain enough information about your company describing your product.

‌


If your startup is in stealth mode, please either work with your investor to validate your investment with their Google Cloud point of contact or respond to this email directly to work with our support team to validate your investment.

‌


If you are not in stealth mode, please re-apply or respond to this email when you have more online materials for our team to review and we’ll be happy to re-process your application.

‌


In the meantime, you can sign up for important updates from the Google for Startups Cloud Program here.

‌


Sincerely,

‌


The Google for Startups Cloud Program Team



 



© Google LLC 1600, Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA 94043

You received this email because it contains important information about your Google for Startups Cloud Program application.
